rules_text:
[i]Initiate[/i] – Jean, Budding Doc enters with a +1/+1 counter on him.
[i]Expertise[/i] – Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Jean.
[i]Doctor[/i] – When Jean leaves the battlefield, support X, where X is his power. Then double the number of counters on each creature that had a counter put on them this way.
